cat.lump.aq.textextraction.wikipedia.categories

Class CategoryExtractor

  • java.lang.Object
    • cat.lump.aq.textextraction.wikipedia.categories.CategoryExtractor

  • public class CategoryExtractor
extends java.lang.Object
    This class extracts all the subcategories from an indicated category in Wikipedia TODO build junit
    Author:
    jboldoba

    • Method Detail

      • getCategoryTree

        public void getCategoryTree(int categoryID,
                   int maxDepth)

      • generateCategoryTree

        public void generateCategoryTree(Category root,
                        int maxDepth)
        Creates a tree of categories with the root category as root and all its subcategories allocated by levels of depth. The maximum depth is defined by maxDepth.
        Parameters:
        root - Category used as root of the tree
        maxDepth - Value of the maximum depth of the tree. If it equals -1, there isn't any maximum depth defined.

      • toFile

        public void toFile(int categoryID,
          int maxDepth)
        Dump tree into a file. The resulting file will have the name [categoryID].[iso639].[maxDept].category
        Parameters:
        categoryID -
        maxDepth -

      • getCategoryTree

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.util.List<CategoryTreeNode>> getCategoryTree()

      • setOutputDir

        public void setOutputDir(java.lang.String outDir)

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Main method. It could be called as a tool to extract the subcategories
        Parameters:
        args - List of input parameters:
        • language: Language of the Wikipedia
        • year: Year of the Wikipedia
        • category: ID of the target category at the Wikipedia defined by language and year.
        • depth: Maximum depth of the subcategories tree allowed to reach when it's extracting them.
        • verbose: Optional. Any value different of 0 indicates that verbose option is enabled.
